function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete knowledge and uncertainties about the safety of air disinfection technologies","Impact":"Limiting practical applications in architecture and increasing the risk of airborne transmission of diseases","Mitigation":"Conducting further studies and research to improve understanding and safety of air disinfection technologies","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation and air purification systems","People":"Architects, building occupants, and visitors","Owner":"Research institutions, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Intensified threats and risks associated with pandemic resilience strategies","Impact":"Potential failure to address other intensified threats beyond the immediate pandemic, leading to ongoing vulnerability","Mitigation":"Developing comprehensive and adaptable resilience strategies that consider multiple threats","Technologies":"Integrated building design with emphasis on touchless technology and advanced ventilation systems","People":"Architects, public health officials, and policymakers","Owner":"Architectural firms, government agencies"},{"Description":"Need for improved ventilation-related interventions to protect against cross-infection","Impact":"Risk of cross-infection and airborne disease transmission within built environments","Mitigation":"Implementing advanced ventilation systems and touchless technology to enhance building immunity","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems and touchless technology","People":"Architects, building occupants, and visitors","Owner":"Architectural firms, building management companies"}]}
